channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Open Source AI Has Founders—and the FTC—Buzzing
item.description: DC went to YC to talk OS.

item.title: Stripe acquires payment processing startup Lemon Squeezy
item.description:
Payments giant Stripe has acquired a four-year-old competitor, Lemon Squeezy, the latter company announced Friday. Terms of the deal were not disclosed. As a merchant of record, Lemon Squeezy calculates and pays global sales tax for digital products, handling legal processing and fees in every country. It primarily serves SaaS and software businesses. In a […]

item.title: Dengue Fever Threatens to Gate-Crash the 2024 Summer Olympics
item.description: Measles, bedbugs, and dengue have all been cited as concerns for tourists and athletes at the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris, with the tropical virus in particular forcing authorities into action.

item.title: Apple reports iCloud Private Relay global outages for some users
item.description:
iCloud Private Relay has not been working for some Apple users across major markets, including the U.S., Europe, India and Japan.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Drew Afualo Will Never Stop Making Fun of Misogynist Men
item.description: The TikTok influencer and podcast host amassed millions of followers for her roasts—and swears she’ll keep doing it even if TikTok goes away.

item.title: Legal tech, VC brawls and saying no to big offers
item.description:
Welcome to Startups Weekly — your weekly recap of everything you can’t miss from the world of startups. To get Startups Weekly in your inbox every Friday, sign up here. This week we are talking about Wiz’s bold decision, VC’s public feud, legal tech’s new capital and a16z’s close call. Let’s go! Most interesting startup stories […]

item.title: The 20 Best Movies on Amazon Prime Right Now (August 2024)
item.description: The Idea of You, Brittany Runs a Marathon, and American Fiction are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: Apple signs the White House’s commitment to AI safety
item.description:
Apple joins 15 other tech companies — including Google, Meta, Microsoft and OpenAI — that committed to the White House's rules for developing generative AI.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 2024 Summer Olympics: A Self-Healing Pole Vault Pole Is One Great Leap for Sports Tech
item.description: Pole vaulting is a spectacular, dangerous sport. Modern poles could be drastically improved to make them more reliable, with healable tech being developed that could also be used in surfing and cycling.

item.title: Privacy watchdog says it’s ‘surprised’ by Elon Musk opting user data into Grok AI training
item.description:
The language is ambiguous, so it's not clear whether X is helping itself to all user data for training Grok or whether this processing refers only to user interactions with the chatbot.
